projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Developed a portfolio website showcasing my web development skills. Implemented sleek animations and intuitive navigation to create user-friendly experiences. Website seamlessly adapts to various devices. Effectively showcases my projects and skills to captivate and inform visitors.

projects.name: Task Management Service
projects.description: Developed a Task Management Service for efficient user and task management. Developed a scalable backend using Scala and Akka, improving system perf. by 40%. Implemented Slick with PostgreSQL for secure and type-safe database interactions. Utilized Typesafe Config and PureConfig for robust configuration management. Ensured comprehensive code quality with proficiency in ScalaTest and Akka HTTP Testkit for test.

projects.name: Currency Convertor
projects.description: The Currency Converter is a web-based tool built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that allows users to convert amounts between different currencies. Fetches the latest exchange rates from an online API. Designed to be responsive for various devices, enhancing user satisfaction by 20%. Implemented error handling that reduced user reported issue by 15%.
